H0.text: Which organisation was founded by the lawyer Peter Benenson in London in 1961. Human Rights Watch

H1.text: Which organisation was founded by the lawyer Peter Benenson in London in 1961. Liberty

H2.text: Which organisation was founded by the lawyer Peter Benenson in London in 1961. The International Commission of Jurists

H3.text: Which organisation was founded by the lawyer Peter Benenson in London in 1961. Amnesty.org

A4.text: Amnesty International was founded in London in 1961 by the lawyer Peter Benenson.

A5.text: Amnesty International (also referred to as Amnesty or AI) is an international non-governmental organization focused on human rights, with its headquarters in the United Kingdom.
